channel.title: Help in runserver
channel.description:
i have made a source from editing testscape and when i click runserver it says
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 1000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:122) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:28)[/code] help anybody! :confused:

item.title: Help in runserver
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

No problem, that’s an annoying error

Read full topic

item.title: Help in runserver
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

Not worried about your jdk problem lol. It’s probably shops.cfg, my bad, hit post before I read it over :s
Someone in shops.cfg, (last thing edited), you had space space 1000,(however many spaces), when it should be tab 1000.

Read full topic

item.description:
@binkar99 wrote:

I have not compiled…i have installed JDK and JRE it says they are not on the computer ihave checked in programmefiles/java and it says they are there and i have edited autospawn.cfg.

Read full topic
